Elec_start¶

Module: Elec_start¶

A module that estimates the electrified population based on parameters nighttime light, distance to transmission lines (HV, MV, LV), roads, substations and transformers, population density¶

Module author: KTH-dES modified by Nandi Moksnes

Functions

calibrate_pop_and_urban(settlement, …)

Calibrate the actual current population, the urban split and forecast the future population

elec_current_and_future(settlement, …)

This function calibrate the current electrification status, and future ‘pre-electrification’ status :param settlement: :param elec_actual: :param pop_cutoff: :param dist_to_trans: :param dist_to_sub: :param dist_minig: :param min_night_lights: :param max_grid_dist: :param urban_elec_ratio: :param rural_elec_ratio: :param max_road_dist: :param pop_actual: :param pop_cutoff2: :param start_year: :param dist_mv: :param dist_lv: :return:
